name: Untitled Jump Game
description:
HOW LONG WILL YOU LAST?

Untitled Jump Game is an action pack arcade game where you have to control a man and keep him from falling to the floor!

Keep your high score and try to improve it every time to unlock hidden dialogue in-game!

Keyboard Controls:

  • Esc - Pause the game. 
  • A & D - Move the player left and right.
  • Space - Jump.

(Xbox) Controller Input Controls: 

  • Left Stick - Horizontal Movement.
  • A - Jump.
